list.title: GetSMS#getAdditionalService
list.description: Method for getting additional service for numbers with forward (only for smsactivate)

list.title: GetSMS#getCode
list.description: Method which polling with getStatus method and returns new status when it's changes

list.title: GetSMS#getCountries
list.description: Method for getting countries list (only for smsactivate)

list.title: GetSMS#getCurrentActivations
list.description: Unofficial / hidden method for getting list of current activations (only for smshub)

list.title: GetSMS#getFullSms
list.description: Method for getting full sms text (only for smsactivate)

list.title: GetSMS#getListOfCountriesAndOperators
list.description: Unofficial / hidden method for getting list of countries & operators (only for smshub)

list.title: GetSMS#getMultiServiceNumber
list.description: Method for getting number for using with several services (only for smsactivate)

list.title: GetSMS#getNumber
list.description:
Method for getting new number
Arguments with * available only for smsactivate

list.title: GetSMS#getQiwiRequisites
list.description: Method for getting Qiwi payment requisites (only for smsactivate)

list.title: GetSMS#setMaxPrice
list.description:
Unofficial / hidden method for changing default number settings (only for smshub) Change max price of mobile number for country id, enable / disable random

WARNING: I don't know why, but really values changed only after ~30 seconds, maybe it's cached on smshub server
